summary: increases on-hit damage of 'wall of' spells.
descriptionHtml:
normal 'wall of' spells use the normal damage of the beginner spells, (flames, etc)Â 

this mod boosts the on-hit damage just a little, from 40% to 66% of the 'wall' damage created by the spells.

By request,
Need something? Just ask.
